ygData.subject: Re: Guild thingy
ygData.msgSnippet: no thx. muhahah. at most I go guildless. muhahah ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive Pacific Internet Technical Support Department . Pacific
ygData.messageBody:
no thx. muhahah. at most I go guildless. muhahah

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> ok... i figured that the guildmaster is just a name... y not garren take
> it... but its always the council that decides what to do n what not? how
> bout that? Garren TAKE THE BLOODY JOB !! cant think of anyone more free than
> u... kekeke...
>
> Nic
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guild thingy
>

> >
> > Ahahahh. thx but no thx.
> >

> >
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > >
> > > I think for all kakis to enjoy this game, lvl different shldn't be too
> big. So, take a look ard u, who the following characterics:
> > >
> > > - Highest lvl goon (time for him to slow down a bit to let other gain
> lvl)
> > > - Can play during work (can perform his GM duties even when working)
> > > - Can play long hr (can organise activities and perform guild duties)
> > > - No life (self-explanatory)
> > >
> > > Anyone with the a/m elements (other than the last points, where most
> kakis posses) will get my nomination ;)
> > >
> > > On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 5:09 PM, Sereph
